content:
You failed, but it's OK, we'll get around it. Please generate the completed, updated AI Influencer table

Understanding Required Fields

🟦 Required = The field must be populated (either AI or manually). If AI can fill it, it will. If AI is unsure, it prompts for human input.

✅ Manually Required = A human must enter this field manually. AI can assist but cannot determine the value on its own.

❌ Not Required = The field is optional and does not block usage.

Knowledge Vault - Property Definitions & Requirements

Property

Type

Required?

Description

Comments/Questions

Name

Text

🟦 Required

The title of the knowledge entry (Book, Article, Podcast, etc.).

-

Tags

Multi-select

🟦 Required

Categorization for filtering and indexing.

If AI misclassifies, should human override be logged?

Media Type

Select

🟦 Required

Type of content (Book, Article, Podcast, Video, etc.).

AI can usually infer from source format.

Full Text/Transcript

Text (Long)

❌ Not Required

Full text or transcript (if applicable).

Needed for deep indexing, but not always available.

Files & Media

File Attachment

❌ Not Required

Attachments related to this knowledge entry (PDFs, images, etc.).

-

Summary

Text (Short)

🟦 Required

A brief summary of the content.

AI auto-generates, human can refine.

Key Takeaways

Text (Long)

🟦 Required

Actionable insights from the content.

AI should generate, but human verification may be needed.

Deep Research Available?

Checkbox

❌ Not Required

Indicates if a full research report exists on this topic.

-

Source Link

URL

❌ Not Required

Link to the original source.

-

AI Influencers & Thought Leaders

Relation (AI Influencers & Thought Leaders)

🟦 Required

Connects this entry to an Influencer or Source in the AI Influencers table.

-

Personal Knowledge Database (PKD)

Relation (PKD)

❌ Not Required

Links this knowledge entry to PKD insights if referenced.

-

Notes & Comments

Text (Long)

❌ Not Required

Any additional notes or context.

-

Date Added

Date

🟦 Required

The date the entry was added.

Auto-generated by system.

Last Accessed

Date

❌ Not Required

The last time this entry was reviewed.

-

Publication Date

Date

❌ Not Required

The original publication date of the content.

-

Priority Level

Select

❌ Not Required

Urgent, High, Medium, Low.

-

Action Required?

Checkbox

❌ Not Required

Flags if follow-up actions are needed.

-

Implementation Status

Select

❌ Not Required

Pending, In Progress, Completed.

-

AI Research & Trend Monitoring

Relation (AI Research & Trend Monitoring)

❌ Not Required

Links this entry to AI Research insights.

-

Active?

Checkbox

✅ Manually Required

Determines if this knowledge entry is actively influencing decisions.

Maybe AI should recommend making inactive or prompt when conflicting with other information for clarification.

Personal Knowledge Database (PKD) - Property Definitions & Requirements

Property

Type

Required?

Description

Comments/Questions

Name

Text

🟦 Required

The title of the PKD entry.

-

Tags

Multi-select

🟦 Required

Categorization for filtering and indexing.

Needed for quick retrieval.

Source

Multi-select

🟦 Required

Where this override or insight originated from (e.g., Research, ChatGPT, Mentor).

Multi-select allows multiple sources.

Description

Text (Short)

🟦 Required

A summary of the insight or override.

-

Deep Dive

Text (Long)

❌ Not Required

A more detailed breakdown of the insight or knowledge.

-

Priority Level

Select

❌ Not Required

Urgent, High, Medium, Low.

Only urgent if immediate action is required.

AI Notes

Text (Long)

❌ Not Required

AI's rationale behind its standard recommendation vs. why the override exists.

-

Creation Date

Date

🟦 Required

The date this PKD entry was created.

Auto-generated by system.

Last Modified

Date

❌ Not Required

Last time this entry was edited.

-

AI Influencers & Thought Leaders

Relation (AI Influencers & Thought Leaders)

🟦 Required

Connects this insight to AI Thought Leaders who influenced it.

Two-way relation with AI Influencers & Thought Leaders.

AI Workflows & Experiments

Relation (AI Workflows & Experiments)

❌ Not Required

Links PKD insights to specific AI-driven workflows.

-

Review Needed

Checkbox

❌ Not Required

Indicates if this override needs periodic review.

-

Contradictory AI Response

Text (Long)

❌ Not Required

If AI originally recommended something different, this captures the contradiction.

-

Knowledge Vault

Relation (Knowledge Vault)

❌ Not Required

Links PKD insights to the broader Knowledge Vault repository.

-

Updates to Be Made in the Canvas:
1️⃣ All Relation fields renamed to match the table they are linked to across PKD, Knowledge Vault, and AI Influencers & Thought Leaders.
2️⃣ AI-Driven Decision Impact clarified as open text field (not dropdown).
3️⃣ Influences Column updated to correctly link to Goals & Principles.
4️⃣ Singularity Roadmap, AI Decision Models, and Productivity Optimization linked to existing PKD entries instead of duplicating.
5️⃣ Influence Scope options finalized: Broad, Limited, Inactive.
6️⃣ Social Media Links Format standardization added to definitions.

Adjustments & Final Decisions:
1️⃣ The Singularity is Near – Let’s use Singularity Roadmap from PKD instead of creating a duplicate.
2️⃣ YouTube Links – Updated to full channel link format instead of just handles.
3️⃣ Deep Learning for Decision-Making – Let’s link to AI Decision Models in PKD instead of making a new entry.
4️⃣ Influences Column – Correct, it should be linked to Goals & Principles. We should update column naming to reflect the correct relationship.
5️⃣ AI-Driven Decision Impact – You’re right, it’s not a dropdown. This should remain open text where AI describes the key decision areas the influencer impacts.
6️⃣ AI-Enhanced Productivity: A Framework – Let’s link to Productivity Optimization in PKD instead of creating a new one.
7️⃣ Standardizing Social Media Links – We’ll define the exact format in the Notion Db Definitions Canvas to ensure consistency.
8️⃣ Renaming Related Columns – Fully agree. Default to the table name for clarity. This should prevent confusion across all tables.
9️⃣ Influence Scope Options – Updated to:

Broad – Includes all available content & live feeds.
Limited – Only considers active Knowledge Base entries.
Inactive – No influence in the system, but still stored for reference.
